name: KinkAlternativeRockRadioNetherlands
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: kink rock
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Enjoy streaming KINK Alternative Rock Radio, one of the Netherlands' top radio stations for alternative rock music. KINK delivers a unique mix of the latest alternative hits and timeless rock classics, all curated by Dutch-speaking DJs.

Whether you’re a fan of cutting-edge rock music or looking to connect with the Netherlands’ vibrant music culture, this skill lets you tune in live, anytime. Please note: The DJs and commentary are in Dutch, offering an authentic Dutch radio experience.

Simply say, "Alexa, open KINK Rock," to start streaming the station directly on your Alexa-enabled device.

Key Features:
- Streams live KINK Alternative Rock Radio from the Netherlands.
- Offers a mix of the latest and classic alternative rock music.
- Features Dutch-speaking DJs, providing an immersive and local radio experience.

Important Notes:
- This skill streams live radio, so an active internet connection is required.
- All DJ commentary and discussions are in Dutch.

How to Use:
1. Enable the skill in the Alexa app or via voice by saying, "Enable KINK Rock."
2. To start streaming, say, "Alexa, open KINK Rock."
3. Alexa will begin playing KINK Alternative Rock Radio live.

Disclaimer:
This skill is not officially associated with or endorsed by KINK Alternative Rock Radio. It simply provides access to the publicly available stream of the station for personal use.

Stay tuned and enjoy the best in alternative rock from the Netherlands with KINK!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
